name: Milkcraft
description:
Our name? Milkcraft.
Our passion? Exploring and pleasure extending.

Those who search for age-old sealed mysteries, self-initiated stories, here are many things you have to see, and believe.
There is no shackles, there is sunlight& trees
There is no loneliness, there is home & companions.
There is no boredom, there is ream&destroy.
There is chaos, and for which there is “us”
There is death, but there awaits the continuation of your odyssey.
Go now, if you want it, there would be otherworlds awaiting.
Go, into the wilderness and the twilight and the sky, what lurks inside, would surprise your eyes:
Between the blooms of dream and flame echos the scream of death, while the atramentous silence blocks the way to the existence of polarize;
Right afront the scorching pyramidate for the departed swoons the deadly caretaker and four-legged riddler, as the eternal resentment wanders in the midst of the shrine where the chilled faith organize.
And it`s not over yet, in the places once experienced the bloody prosperity of humanity, a forefather`s eve is still giving stage by the remains of the Dominating Ones of ancientry.
That`s the appearance of the chaos that awaits, waiting for your challenge for treasure and fame.
And for sure, there would also be an arcadia, right inside the overworld, for peace and recuperation, just for you&friends.
There would also be colonies in this endless frontier, made up of the camaraderie and collective mind, claiming our existence, right on the good soil beneath us.
There is far far more for you, but I could say,
There`s adventure out there, and our goal is to find it.
Come with Us!
